attributes.action: Stop 5g in the UK because its so dangerous, it should be stopped world wide.
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ChS3J893rpI&feature=share

This is one of many videos on 5g
attributes.background: Let's just say if we as human beings want to survive we need to stop this now. 5g will destroy our planet and all that is alive. The alarming side effects that trees are dying within as little as 10ft of a 5g antenna, birds falling from the sky. Let's stop this now before total extinction starts.
